resources.string: You have got 5 minutes to settle down and start doing it.
Choose, Black or White? If it matches, you do it.
Heads or Tails? If it matches, you do it.
Right or left? One has \'Do it\' and the other has \'Don\'t\'
If you scream as loud as you can right now then you get an hour of break
Do it, but only for 30 mins
Amp yourself up with 1 motivational song cuz then you start doing it.
So now that you are free, what are you doing?
To reach out to me click here
Don\'t you dare go back Now!
